text:
Just putting a Marketplace Bug here that was reported to me a moment ago from customer (8319988). She said...

```Trying to purchase the theme today for my client on HubSpot but abandoned checkout yesterday and the purchase link on HubSpot is now permanently disabled and says the purchase is in progress. Any thoughts on next steps? HubSpot support suggested I contact you.```
Support tickets created: Hers = #8282082. Mine on behalf of her = #8282495
This might be the reason why I haven't received any installs since the new marketplace was launched!

<@U019MT3T7B7> I don't think that's the case as this bug is specific to someone abandoning the purchase flow and then trying to come back to it which I'm assuming happens very rarely and not a common user path.
